com.rowl.plugdj.api

Interface PlugAPI


  • public interface PlugAPI
    Represents instance of PlugAPI which individual for every extension.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PlugAPI.Event
      The enum Event.
      static interface  PlugAPI.EventListener<T extends PDJEvent>
      Simple interface that is used to implement your actions when an event is called by the app.
      static class  PlugAPI.GlobalRole
      Contains constants about global role ids.
      static class  PlugAPI.PDJActivityType
      Contains all activities that can be modified by the API.
      static class  PlugAPI.PDJFragmentType
      Contains all fragments that can be modified by the API.
      static class  PlugAPI.RoomRole
      Contains constants about room role ids.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Registers the specified listener to the given event.
      void chatLog(java.lang.String logMessage)
      Creates chat log message visible only to the app user.

      Gets information about selected activity.

      Gets app setting.

      Gets the currently visible activity created by the app.

      Allows to dispatch a task to the plug.dj UI thread.

      Allows to dispatch a task to worker thread pool which will execute this task in background task.

      Sends chat message to everybody in the room that user is in.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Allows to dispatch a task to the plug.dj UI thread.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the runnable task

      • runAsync

        void runAsync(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Allows to dispatch a task to worker thread pool which will execute this task in background task.

        Warning: Do no try to access plug.dj app for task that run asynchronously as the api is not thread-safe!

        Parameters:
        runnable - the runnable task

      • sendChat

        void sendChat(java.lang.String chatMessage)
        Sends chat message to everybody in the room that user is in.
        Parameters:
        chatMessage - message to send

      • chatLog

        void chatLog(java.lang.String logMessage)
        Creates chat log message visible only to the app user.
        Parameters:
        logMessage - message to display

      • getUser

        PDJUser getUser(int userId)
        Gets the user with given userId.
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user to retrieve
        Returns:
        a user object if user was found in the current room

      • getUser

        PDJUser getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Gets the user with given username.
        Parameters:
        username - name of the user to retrieve
        Returns:
        a user object if user was found in the current room

      • loadUser

        java.util.concurrent.Future<PDJUser> loadUser(int userId)
        This method is very similar to @see #getUser(int). The main difference is that it will try to get that user from current room and then try to load that user if user is offline or in different room.
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user to retrieve
        Returns:
        future future

      • getCurrentActivity

        android.app.Activity getCurrentActivity()
        Gets the currently visible activity created by the app.
        Returns:
        current activity

      • getCurrentRoomState

        PDJRoomState getCurrentRoomState()
        Get the current room state that user is in.
        Returns:
        current room state

      • addEventListener

        void addEventListener(PDJExtension extension,
                      PlugAPI.Event event,
                      PlugAPI.EventListener eventListener)
        Registers the specified listener to the given event.

        Currently it's impossible to remove event listener once it's added. However, the app itself will remove all listeners after onDisable method was called.

        Parameters:
        extension - Extension to register
        event - Event type to register
        eventListener - Listener to register

      • startActivity

        void startActivity(java.lang.Class<? extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment> fragmentClass)
        Start activity.
        Parameters:
        fragmentClass - the fragment class

      • setAppSetting

        void setAppSetting(java.lang.String key,
                   boolean value)
        Sets app setting.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value

      • getAppSetting

        boolean getAppSetting(java.lang.String key)
        Gets app setting.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the app setting

      • getApplicationContext

        android.content.Context getApplicationContext()
        This is very powerful method which gives you android application context of this application. Context enables you to get walk-around of many limitations which this api has, with this method you can get application object, register listener for activity life cycles and much more.
        Returns:
        application context

      • getFragmentInfo

        PDJFragmentInfo getFragmentInfo(PlugAPI.PDJFragmentType fragmentTag)
        Gets information about selected fragment.
        Parameters:
        fragmentTag - the fragment tag
        Returns:
        the fragment info

      • getActivityInfo

        PDJActivityInfo getActivityInfo(PlugAPI.PDJActivityType activityTag)
        Gets information about selected activity.
        Parameters:
        activityTag - the activity tag
        Returns:
        the activity info
